abstract: Fiat Chrysler is recalling almost 477,000 sport utility vehicles because fix for some autos in 2014 recall was not entirely effective; action is related to defect in electrical wiring for passenger side illuminated vanity mirror, and covers 2011 and 2012 Jeep Grand Cherokees and Dodge Durangos.
lead_paragraph: An earlier fix to approximately 477,000 Jeep Grand Cherokees and Dodge Durangos being recalled again did not always work.

headline.main: Fiat Chrysler Recalls S.U.V.s a Second Time
headline.print_headline: Fiat Chrysler Recalls S.U.V.s a Second Time for a Fix That Didn’t Work

snippet: An earlier fix to approximately 477,000 Jeep Grand Cherokees and Dodge Durangos being recalled again did not always work.
